long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn New Words Effortlessly While Browsing

LingoTag is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance your vocabulary while you browse the web. Highlight unknown words, save their meanings, and see them highlighted in yellow the next time you encounter them online. With LingoTag, language learning becomes seamless and integrated into your daily web activities.

Key Features:
1. Highlight and save words with their meanings directly from any webpage.
2. View saved words highlighted in yellow when they appear on other pages.
